body:
I dont think it matters if it was translated....I dont what the FKING HELL is the main story talking about even I speak Chinese as mother language. It's a chaotic mixture of popular culture, memes, Chinese mythology and some mysterious shit (lol).
So, enjoy the legs and tits without thinking too seriously. :/
When is this gonna fcking end. End this already so people can actually translate!
god damn, thier legs are sexy. really like the one on page 111
